data.actual_result: The notif appears in about 2 second which obviously, is less than the time it should take and that doesn't even stay long.
data.expected_result: The notif doesn't appear if you have a strong connection.
data.short_description: The in app notification (that contains the link to the Twitter handle and server status page) that appears when you have problem connecting, appears every time you clear Discord's data and restart the app no matter how strong your connection is.
data.steps_to_repro: - Clear Discord's data from your device. - Open Discord. - Login. - Observe the screen.
